subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Mendoza, an all-American and an Olympic gold medalist as a softball player, has performed so well for ESPN in place of the suspended Curt Schilling that she appears to have earned an enhanced role in its future baseball coverage.
snippet: Mendoza, an all-American and an Olympic gold medalist as a softball player, has performed so well for ESPN in place of the suspended Curt Schilling that she appears to have earned an enhanced role in its future baseball coverage.
